title: Behavioural change and changing habits
subtitle: Follow Up: People who want to continue the talk can meet
description:
Let’s discuss the power of habits and what it takes to change behaviour.
A free discussion about behavioural change and its methods (Cognitive behavioral therapy, motivational interviewing etc.), the power of habits and how to change them.I'd also like to discuss how healthy lifestyle changes can prevent diabetes type 2 and other chronic diseases.----We'll continue the discussion tomorrow (December 30). The slides will also follow on that day (December 30).
